template.name: App Engine Java Servlet Module
template.description:
Creates the simplest example of an App Engine backend module containing a Java servlet. This module contains the smallest amount of boilerplate code, which makes it perfect for setting up the backend development environment in Android Studio.

If you need the features that Cloud Endpoints provide (such as automated object marshalling/unmarshalling) or push notification support, have a look at the "App Engine Java Endpoints Module" and "App Engine Backend with Google Cloud Messaging" templates.
